scripts.install: (cd client && npm install) && (cd server && npm install)
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client npm run start" && "cd server npm run start"
